statements: DELETE FROM VolunteerEngagementData WHERE volunteer_id = 101 AND engagement_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM VolunteerEngagementData WHERE project_name = 'Community Cleanup' AND hours_volunteered > 5.0;
DELETE FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM volunteer_activity WHERE volunteer_id = 2 AND date_completed < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM volunteer_activities WHERE volunteer_id = 10 AND hours_spent > 5;
DELETE FROM volunteer_hours WHERE hours < 5 OR hours > 10;
